name: One Byte
description:
One Byte is a game made by a team of 2 where you have to make bit combinations to increase damage / do area damage.

Cheat Codes:

R Key: Reset Level

P Key: Reset Save File

Credits:

Game Programmer and Developer: Ali Azeem - https://aliazeem.itch.io/

Sound Designer: Christos Kerastaris - https://zed16fx.itch.io/
